original_text: and though my condition was a trial to you, you did not scorn or despise me, but received me as an angel of God, as Christ Jesus.
korean_text: 너희를 시험하는 것이 내 육체에 있으되 이것을 너희가 업신여기지도 아니하며 버리지도 아니하고 오직 나를 하나님의 천사와 같이 또는 그리스도 예수와 같이 영접하였도다

sentences.original_text: and though my condition was a trial to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나의 형편이 여러분에게 시련이 되었지만

sentences.original_text: you did not scorn or despise me
but received me as an angel of God
